channel.title: Spatial Join on A grrrl powered data blog
channel.description: Recent content in Spatial Join on A grrrl powered data blog

item.title: Census and Coordinate Conundrums in California
item.description: Background Over the last couple of years I have had the opportunity to work on projects that provide financial, demographic and indicator data from a geographical perspective so that people can find their location on a map and discover information about their locality and how they compare to their neighbors and ideally peers. Geographies of data In order to associate data like debt burden, population density, and such, we needed some field that identified the locality so that it would show up on the map, ideally in the correct spot.
